程序包 control.videoManagement

类 EditVideoController

java.lang.Object
control.Controller
control.videoManagement.UploadVideoController
control.videoManagement.EditVideoController
所有已实现的接口:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class EditVideoController
extends UploadVideoController
This class is inherited from Controller
This class mainly focus on the process of modifying new Video information
It provides some specific method for coach and admin to modify videos
从以下版本开始:
23 April 2021
版本:
1.0
作者:
Zai Song
